channel.title: CVE Feed for Happyforms -- Happyforms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Happyforms -- Happyforms

item.title: CVE-2024-44063|2024-09-15T19:49:10.165Z -- happyforms -- happyforms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Happyforms allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Happyforms: from n/a through 1.26.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-23521|2024-06-11T17:12:11.785Z -- happyforms -- happyforms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Happyforms.This issue affects Happyforms: from n/a through 1.25.10.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Happyforms allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Happyforms: from n/a through 1.26.0.
